N

NonPlayerCharacter - Class in advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.character
AI controlled Character class, implements all functionality provided by it's superclass Character.
NonPlayerCharacter(String, String, Room, List<Item>, int) - Constructor for class advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.character.NonPlayerCharacter
Default constructor for creating a NPC, provides all creation ability.
NonPlayerCharacter(String, String, Room, List<Item>) - Constructor for class advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.character.NonPlayerCharacter
Second constructor, assumes MAX_WEIGHT over defined weight as parameter.
NonPlayerCharacter(String, String, Room) - Constructor for class advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.character.NonPlayerCharacter
Third constructor, assumes no items are provided or a maximum weight is provided and such provides an empty list as well as the DEFAULT_MAX_WEIGHT.
nonPlayerCharacters() - Method in class advjava.assessment1.zuul.refactored.character.CharacterManager
Get a list of all non player characters within the character manager
northExit - Variable in class advjava.assessment1.zuul.Room
Deprecated.
